channel.title: Vengance attacking when attacked?

item.title: Vengance attacking when attacked?
item.dc:creator: @Gh0st_Jr Gh0st Jr
item.description:
@Gh0st_Jr wrote:

ok, so in my vengance im trying to get it so that once you click it, it does the gfx/animation and then once you get hit by someone it recoils and attacks back like a ring of reciol, but hits higherâ€¦ I dont know if these are right.

public boolean vengence = false; public int vengencetimer = 0; public void gethurt(int maxDamage) {

case 51039: //veng if(vengence) { sendMessage("You Already have Vengence"); } else if(vengencetimer > 0) { sendMessage("You Must Wait 30 Seconds Before Casting Vengence Again"); }else{ if(playerLevel[6] >= 94) { if(!playerHasItemAmount(557, 10) || !playerHasItemAmount(13755, 4) || !playerHasItemAmount(560, 2)) { sendMessage("You Need 4 Astrals ,2 Death, and 10 Earth runes to cast this spell"); } else{ startAnimation(1914); gfx100(642); vengence = true; vengencetimer = 30; deleteItem(557 ,getItemSlot(557), 10); deleteItem(557 ,getItemSlot(560), 2); deleteItem(13755 ,getItemSlot(13755), 4); } }else{ sendMessage("You Need 94 Magic To Use Vengence"); } } break;

i have but im not sure on where to put them.
